EmailTemplate.subject: Take control of your peering edge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Want more control of your peering edge? Our white paper outlines the background to why @stubarea51 <[[https://twitter.com/stubarea51/status/1095849604854239232]]> likes the layout and visuals to track flows in our automated peering solution. It's the kind of data you need to make better decisions on peering and traffic policies. Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
